column4: Can anyone give me step by step instructions for installing Logmein Hamachi2, Im a total noob to Ubuntu 11.04 so if you could help me out, that would be awesome.
Oh, and the GUI for it
I got the .deb for hamachi... and used the "sudo dpkg -i hamachi.deb" and it APPEARS to have installed. But i don't know what to do from this point.
